    • About Stellar Realty Northwest


    Since opening its doors in 2009, Stellar Realty Northwest has done $39.5 million dollars in sales volume and over 175 transactions. Over the years, Scott Besaw and Paul Campbell have helped facilitate a wide range of real estate sales including bank-owned, short sales, bare land, condos, and luxury homes. In order to accommodate the teamâs vast experience with a variety of real estate endeavors, our office is centrally located in order to best serve all of Portland and its surrounding areas.

    Along with a team that includes agents with over 40 years of combined experience and a full-time office support staff, Stellar Realty Northwest has helped hundreds of buyers and sellers reach their real-estate goals. Their unique team approach, combined with industry leading technology, has allowed them to provide an experience for their clients that is unparalleled in the industry.

    Scott Besaw and Paul Campbell
